NotFound.title: This page could not be found

Disclaimer.text1: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on our website, we cannot guarantee the complete accuracy or reliability of the content. The information provided is intended for general informational purposes only and should not be considered professional advice.
Disclaimer.text2: We are not responsible for any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in the content, nor for any losses or damages arising from reliance on the information presented. It is your responsibility to verify any information before making decisions based on it.
Disclaimer.text3: Please note that our services may not be suitable for everyone. We recommend consulting with a professional for specific advice tailored to your needs.
Disclaimer.text4: By using our website, you agree to these terms and conditions.

PrivacyPolicy.preamble: {entity} is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you visit our website or interact with our services.

item1.title: Personal Information
item1.text: When you create an account or contact us, we may collect your name, email address, and password.

item2.title: Usage Data
item2.text: We may collect information about how you interact with our website, such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited.

item1.title: Authentication
item1.text: We use your information to authenticate your access to our website and services

item2.title: Communication
item2.text: We may use your contact information to respond to inquiries or provide updates.

item3.title: Analytics
item3.text: We may use usage data to improve our website and services.

item1.title: Third-Party Service Providers
item1.text: We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who help us operate our website and services (e.g., for authentication, email delivery).

item2.title: Legal Requirements
item2.text: We may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights.

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.text1: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.

your_rights.title: Your Rights
your_rights.text1: You have the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data.
your_rights.text2: You can exercise these rights by contacting us at {email}

cookies_and_tracking.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies_and_tracking.text1: We use cookies to enhance your user experience and collect usage data. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

third_party_services.title: Third-Party Services
third_party_services.text1: We may use third-party services that collect and process personal information. Please refer to the privacy policies of these services for more details.

childrens_privacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrens_privacy.text1: Our website is not intended for children under the age of {age}. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

changes_to_this_policy.title: Changes to This Policy
changes_to_this_policy.text1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website.
